p: Three methods were applied to determine the AOA of extracts from the studied Scutellaria species, namely ORAC, HORAC and electrochemical one. S. altissima(M) and S. galericulata(P) show the highest activity according to ORAC (1280.2 and 1155.2 µmol TE/g), S. albida(M) and S. altissima(B) (653.8 and 583.0 µmol GAE/g) according to HORAC ( Table 4) and the methanol extract of S. albida(M) (16.1 AOA) according to the electrochemical ( Table 5).
